definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
the king looked left and right and then talked of other things/to digress from the topic of discussion (idiom)
pinyin: wang2 gu4 zuo3 you4 er2 yan2 ta1

definition: same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
in a nutshell/to put it briefly

sentences.english: What does pop music do for us that's very helpful?
sentences.chinese: 就這點而言流行音樂對我們來說有什麼用處呢？

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我們的價值觀和民主權力而言，諸如此類都是如此。

sentences.english: On the whole, average weekly hours are far below their pre-recession level.
sentences.chinese: 整體而言，周平均工作時間比起衰退前大幅下滑。

sentences.english: Compared with the TFP, the role of labor capital accumulation are more prominent.
sentences.chinese: 與TFP相比而言，勞均資本積累的作用更爲突出。

sentences.english: But external hemorrhoids usually resolve in a week or so.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，外痔引起的不適可在一週左右解除。

sentences.english: He is perfect as the sensitive but strong reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他把一個敏感而言詞犀利的記者演得完美無缺。

sentences.english: For fatal cases, the course of illness takes an average of two days.
sentences.chinese: 就死亡病例而言，病程平均兩天。

sentences.english: I'm having so much fun with it!
sentences.chinese: 對我而言，在生日時收到祝語最有意義。

sentences.english: And it is vital to the stability of the region.
sentences.chinese: 穩定對於這一國家而言是至關重要的。

sentences.english: However, in a word, for the hard-working men, every minute is precious.
sentences.chinese: 但總而言之，對於忙碌工作的人，有時一刻就值千金。

sentences.english: For me, reading about chemo brain has resurrected that faint taste of metal.
sentences.chinese: 對我而言，讀到化療腦使我重新想起了金屬味。

sentences.english: Typically, the modem is connected to one of the serial ports on the computer.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，數據機會連接至電腦上的其中一個序列埠。

sentences.english: Of product structure, in order, represented by lower-middle class plush toys.
sentences.chinese: 就產品結構而言，以長毛絨爲代表的中低檔玩具爲主。

sentences.english: As far as clothing goes, so it lasts longer.
sentences.chinese: 就衣服而言，它會更耐穿的。

sentences.english: For others, it can be a trap that can last forever.
sentences.chinese: 對於其他人而言，它可能是永遠走不出的陷阱。

sentences.english: Eating fish overall is greatly beneficial to your health, especially that of your brain.
sentences.chinese: 喫魚有益健康，特別是對您的大腦而言更是如此。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
